verses.verse: In the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had gone <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> on that very day <S%H3117><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

When they set <S%H5265><s%> out from Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> camped <S%H2583><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to God, <S%H430><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and tell <S%H5046><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

'You yourselves <S%H9043><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> to the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and [how] I bore <S%H5375><s%> you on eagles' wings, <S%H3671><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> you to Myself.

'Now <S%H6258><s%> then, if <S%H518><s%> you will indeed <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> My voice <S%H6963><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> My covenant, <S%H1285><s%> then you shall be My own possession <S%H5459><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is Mine;

and you shall be to Me a kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of priests <S%H3548><s%> and a holy <S%H6918><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>' These <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> that you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "All <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> we will do! <S%H6213><s%>" And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I shall come <S%H935><s%> to you in a thick <S%H5672><s%> cloud, <S%H6051><s%> in order <S%H5668><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> may hear <S%H8085><s%> when I speak <S%H1696><s%> with you, and may also <S%H1571><s%> believe <S%H539><s%> in you forever. <S%H5769><s%>" Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> also said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> them today <S%H3117><s%> and tomorrow, <S%H4279><s%> and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> their garments; <S%H8071><s%>

and let them be ready <S%H3559><s%> for the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> for on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

"And you shall set <S%H1379><s%> bounds <S%H1379><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around, <S%H5439><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Beware <S%H8104><s%> that you do not go <S%H5927><s%> up on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> or touch <S%H5060><s%> the border <S%H7097><s%> of it; whoever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>

'No <S%H3808><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall touch <S%H5060><s%> him, but he shall surely <S%H5619><s%> be stoned <S%H5619><s%> or <S%H176><s%> shot <S%H3384><s%> through; <S%H3384><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> or <S%H518><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> he shall not live. <S%H2421><s%>' When the ram's horn <S%H3104><s%> sounds <S%H4900><s%> a long <S%H4900><s%> blast, <S%H4900><s%> they shall come <S%H5927><s%> up to the mountain. <S%H2022><s%> "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> and consecrated <S%H6942><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they washed <S%H3526><s%> their garments. <S%H8071><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Be ready <S%H3559><s%> for the third <S%H7969><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> do not go <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> a woman. <S%H802><s%>"

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when it was morning, <S%H1242><s%> that there were thunder <S%H6963><s%> and lightning <S%H1300><s%> flashes <S%H1300><s%> and a thick <S%H3515><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> upon the mountain <S%H2022><s%> and a very <S%H3966><s%> loud <S%H2389><s%> trumpet <S%H7782><s%> sound, <S%H6963><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] in the camp <S%H4264><s%> trembled. <S%H2729><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of the camp <S%H4264><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and they stood <S%H3320><s%> at the foot <S%H8482><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

Now Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> [was] all <S%H3605><s%> in smoke <S%H6225><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> upon it in fire; <S%H784><s%> and its smoke <S%H6227><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> like the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of a furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H2729><s%> violently. <S%H3966><s%>

When the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> grew <S%H1980><s%> louder <S%H2388><s%> and louder, <S%H3966><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him with thunder. <S%H6963><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> warn <S%H5749><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they break <S%H2040><s%> through <S%H2040><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to gaze, <S%H7200><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> of them perish. <S%H5307><s%>

"And also <S%H1571><s%> let the priests <S%H3548><s%> who come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> consecrate <S%H6942><s%> themselves, lest <S%H6435><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> break <S%H6555><s%> out against them."

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "The people <S%H5971><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> for Thou didst warn <S%H5749><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Set <S%H1379><s%> bounds <S%H1379><s%> about the mountain <S%H2022><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> it.'"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H1980><s%> and come <S%H5927><s%> up [again,] you and Aaron <S%H175><s%> with you; but do not let the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> break <S%H2040><s%> through <S%H2040><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> He break <S%H6555><s%> forth <S%H6555><s%> upon them."
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H1980><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> and told <S%H559><s%> them.
